Description.Text: Kristall is a traditional 3-star hotel offering comfortable accommodation in southwest Milan. Highlights include free onsite parking, complimentary Wi-Fi. a bar and 24-hour reception. Navigli is a bustling, fashionable district close to the traditional Porta Genova city gate. The area contains several open spaces and canals and is renowned for its diverse and vibrant nightlife. Nearby places of interest include the ancient, medieval and Renaissance church complex, San Cristoforo sul Naviglio and the Navigli canal system, whose banks are lined with bars, nightclubs and restaurants. San Cristoforo train station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Milan destinations. The hotel occupies a traditional mid-rise building featuring a mansard roof and red facade. Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas. Standard rooms are decorated in a modern style with a neutral colour scheme and parquet flooring. Amenities include a flat-screen satellite TV, mini-bar, air-conditioning, a safe, free wired internet and an en-suite bathroom. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning and guests can enjoy a range of drinks at the hotel bar. Free public and chargeable garage parking are possible onsite. The hotel has a 24-hour reception.
